name: Overlays
description: Manual accessibility checklist for overlay components (dialogs, modals, popovers, tooltips, menus)

items.description: Overlay has correct role (dialog, alertdialog, menu, tooltip)
items.procedure: Inspect the overlay element and verify appropriate ARIA role is applied
items.expectedOutcome: Screen reader announces the overlay type correctly when opened

items.description: Overlay has accessible name via aria-labelledby or aria-label
items.procedure: Verify dialog has aria-labelledby pointing to title, or aria-label for unnamed overlays
items.expectedOutcome: Screen reader announces the overlay title/purpose when opened

items.description: Focus moves to overlay when opened
items.procedure: Open the overlay and verify focus moves to the first focusable element or the overlay container
items.expectedOutcome: Focus is placed inside the overlay, not on the trigger or behind it

items.description: Focus is trapped within modal overlays
items.procedure: With modal open, Tab through all elements and verify focus wraps within the modal
items.expectedOutcome: Focus cannot escape the modal via keyboard until dismissed

items.description: Overlay can be closed with Escape key
items.procedure: Open the overlay and press Escape
items.expectedOutcome: Overlay closes and focus returns to the trigger element

items.description: Focus returns to trigger when overlay closes
items.procedure: Close the overlay using any method and verify focus position
items.expectedOutcome: Focus returns to the element that opened the overlay

items.description: Modal overlays mark background content as inert
items.procedure: With modal open, verify background content has aria-hidden='true' or inert attribute
items.expectedOutcome: Screen readers cannot navigate to background content while modal is open

items.description: Content reading order is logical within overlay
items.procedure: Navigate through overlay content with screen reader and verify order makes sense
items.expectedOutcome: Content is announced in a logical, meaningful sequence

items.description: Tooltips are accessible via hover and focus
items.procedure: Hover over trigger and Tab to trigger to verify tooltip appears in both cases
items.expectedOutcome: Tooltip content is accessible via mouse hover AND keyboard focus

items.description: Tooltip content is dismissable without moving pointer
items.procedure: Trigger tooltip and press Escape to dismiss
items.expectedOutcome: Tooltip can be dismissed via Escape without moving mouse

items.procedure: Open menu and navigate using arrow keys
items.expectedOutcome: Arrow keys move through menu items, Enter/Space activates selection

items.description: Menu trigger has aria-haspopup and aria-expanded
items.procedure: Inspect menu trigger element for ARIA attributes
items.expectedOutcome: Trigger has aria-haspopup='menu' and aria-expanded updates on open/close
